availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Letitia Mobberly Walker. Father of Priscilla Walker, Margaret Walker, William Walker, and Floyd Walker. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p.392B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District No. 1, p. 555.

"Mary Letitia Walker (1820-1909)," Find A Grave, Memorial #26701858, Accessed September 7, 2022.
